fn.p: Model-averaged parameter estimates, standard errors (SE) and P-values from the ‘model-avg’ function [ 65] were considered for variables occurring in the respective sets of competitive models for (A) Overall habitat selection at the landscape scale. (B) Seasonal habitat selection at the landscape. (C) Overall habitat selection at the field scale. (D) Seasonal habitat selection at the field scale. Model averaging was performed over the set of competitive models (ΔAICc ≤ 2; see Table 2).

NAs stand for explanatory variables which were not tested for the corresponding response variables, whereas ‘-‘ means that the explanatory variable was tested but not retained in the competitive models for that response variable. Significance
